H0.text: who was vp for lincoln. Hannibal Hamlin

H1.text: who was vp for lincoln. Salmon Chase

H2.text: who was vp for lincoln. William Seward

H3.text: who was vp for lincoln. Andrew Johnson

A4.text: Hannibal Hamlin was the 15th vice president of the United States, serving from 1861 to 1865, during President Abraham Lincoln's first term.

A5.text: Hamlin swore Johnson in as vice president.

A6.text: A biography of Hannibal Hamlin is available at Mr. Lincoln's White House.

A7.text: The Life and Times of Hannibal Hamlin was written by Charles Eugene Hamlin.
